ArgonTest.Name: Access public method in different module
ArgonTest.InputSource:
module _
import Argon.Core::* import ::Module2::MyInstance
proc main(): () do MyInstance.my_public_method() end

module Module2
import Argon.Core::*
public trait MyTrait public proc _.my_public_method(): () = puts "called my_public_method" end
public instance MyInstance: MyTrait end
